Posts.Content: I have just been diagnosed with PMPS...after 6 1/2 years of dibilitating pain and spasm. No, doctors do not know, for 6 1/2 I was told nothing showed on my scans, so therefore nothing is wrong. Drugs, that was their answer, drugs. It's a sad world. I am now to the point of no return. My PM&R Doc is going to do his best to help. He will not make any promises. He was my last hope.
Posts.Title: Post mastectomy pain syndrome
